pages.title: Bone Wand
pages.text: The bone wand is used to open portals to the prehistoric dimensions. It is crafted from diamonds, $(l:basics/resin_prod)resin$(/l) and a bone.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: The bone wand needs to be enchanted with the Enchantment of Time Reversal, either found in certain chests as loot (like in desert temples), as a random enchantment in an enchantment table or as a guaranteed max level trade with a Palaeobotanist villager.
